attributes.action: look after the civilian staff in the same way other employers have to.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goverment should also take into account the civilian staff living and working in germany when they give pay rises and other benefits to serving soldiers. or is it a given  that the civilian staff paying german taxes,health insurance pension contributions and other payments to the German goverment like solidarity tax this tax is for the rebuilding of the former East Germany should be paid less than the uk minimum wage?
